0.name: Corkage Fee
0.fullDesc: Deals Fire DMG equal to <orangeStrong>{{1}}%</orangeStrong> of Gallagher's ATK to a single target enemy.
0.shortDesc: Deals minor Fire DMG to a single enemy.

1.name: Nectar Blitz
1.fullDesc: Deals Fire DMG equal to <orangeStrong>{{1}}%</orangeStrong> of Gallagher's ATK to a single target enemy. Reduces the target's ATK by <orangeStrong>{{2}}%</orangeStrong>, lasting for {{3}} turn(s).
1.shortDesc: Deals Fire DMG to a single enemy and reduces ATK.

0.name: Special Brew
0.fullDesc: Immediately heals a target ally for <orangeStrong>{{1}}</orangeStrong> HP.

0.name: Champagne Etiquette
0.fullDesc: Inflicts Besotted on all enemies, lasting for {{2}} turn(s). At the same time, deals Fire DMG equal to <orangeStrong>{{1}}%</orangeStrong> of Gallagher's ATK to all enemies, and enhances this unit's next Basic ATK to Nectar Blitz.
0.shortDesc: <orangeStrong>Inflicts Besotted</orangeStrong> on all enemies and deals Fire DMG to them at the same time. Enhances this unit's next Basic ATK to Nectar Blitz.

0.name: Artisan Elixir
0.fullDesc: Immediately attacks the enemy. Upon entering battle, inflicts Besotted on all enemies, lasting for {{1}} turn(s). And deals Fire DMG equal to {{2}}% of Gallagher's ATK to all enemies.
0.shortDesc: Attacks the enemy. After entering battle, <orangeStrong>inflicts Besotted</orangeStrong> to all enemies and deals minor Fire DMG to all enemies.

0.name: Attack
0.fullDesc: Attacks an enemy, and when the battle starts, reduces their Toughness of the corresponding Type.

1.name: Salty Dog
1.desc: When Gallagher enters the battle, regenerates {{1}} Energy and increases Effect RES by {{2}}%.

2.name: Lion's Tail
2.desc: When using the Skill, removes {{1}} debuff(s) from a target ally. At the same time, increases their Effect RES by {{2}}%, lasting for {{3}} turn(s).

3.name: Corpse Reviver
3.desc: Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.\nBasic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

4.name: Last Word
4.desc: Extends the duration of the Besotted state inflicted by Gallagher's Ultimate by {{1}} turn(s).

5.name: Death in the Afternoon
5.desc: Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.\nTalent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

6.name: Blood and Sand
6.desc: Increases Gallagher's Break Effect by {{1}}% and Weakness Break Efficiency by {{2}}%.
